LanguageData.MUR_SubsurfaceConduit_SteelCostDesc: How much steel a single piece of conduit requires. Default: 3
LanguageData.MUR_SubsurfaceConduit_WorkCostDesc: How much work it takes to build a single piece of conduit. Default: 50
LanguageData.MUR_SubsurfaceConduit_UnderWallDesc: By default a subsurface conduit can not be placed underneath an already constructed wall. Walls can be built on top of them however. This option removes this restriction.
